meta.description: We build infrastructure, integrate AI, and ship embedded systems. From cloud to silicon — we deliver.

services.label: What we do
services.title: Services
services.description: End-to-end engineering across the full technology stack.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: Docker orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, server hardening, monitoring. Production-grade infrastructure that scales.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: On-premise LLM deployment, speech synthesis, whisper transcription, custom AI pipelines on your own hardware.

embedded.title: Embedded & IoT
embedded.description: Custom firmware, drone flight controllers, telemetry systems, hardware multiplexors. From PCB to cloud.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Full-stack applications with React, Next.js, Fastify. Real-time dashboards, SaaS platforms, admin panels.

projects.label: Our work
projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Real systems running in production. Not demos, not prototypes.

sortina.description: Logistics rate management platform with multi-role access and real-time data.

dcc.description: Ground station for drone fleet management with live telemetry and mission planning.

china-tours.description: Platform connecting businesses with 258+ tech companies for organized factory visits.

mux.description: Custom hardware & firmware for multi-channel analog video switching with serial control.

about.label: Who we are
about.headline: Full-stack. From silicon to cloud.
about.p1: We're a small engineering team based in Asia that ships across the entire technology stack — from embedded C firmware to React dashboards, from Docker infrastructure to custom AI deployments.
about.p2: Every project we take on runs in production. No prototypes gathering dust. We build things that work, harden them, and keep them running.

items.quote: They rebuilt our entire monitoring stack in two weeks. Zero downtime during migration.
items.author: CTO

items.quote: The only team that understood both the firmware and the cloud side of our IoT project.
items.author: Founder

items.quote: Production-ready from day one. No hand-holding required after handoff.
items.author: VP Engineering

contact.label: Let's talk
contact.headline: Have a project in mind?
contact.description: We're always looking for interesting engineering challenges. Drop us a line and let's build something great.

form.name: Name
form.successSub: We'll get back to you soon.

blog.description: Technical deep-dives, infrastructure war stories, and lessons from production.
